gurmukhi: su mwr mwr sUrmw pukwr mwr kY cly ]AnMq rudR ky gxo ibAMq bIrhw dly ]
transliteration: Su Maar Maar Soormaa Poukaar Maar Kai Chale|| Anant Rudra Ke Gado Beant Beer-haa Dale||
translation: The brave fighters marched forward with their shouts of “kill, kill”. And form this side, the ganas of Rudra destroyed innumerable warriors.

gurmukhi: GmMf Gor swvxI AGor ijau Gtw auTI ]AnMq bUMd bwx Dwr su`D kRuD kY buTI ]34]
transliteration: Ghamannd Ghor Saavaniaghor Jio Ghataa Outhee|| Anant Boond Baan Dhaar Suddh Kruddh Kai Bouthee||34||
translation: The furious arrows are being showered like the drops form the visible rising dark thundering clouds in the month of Sawan.34.

gurmukhi: ibAMq sUr DwvhI ]su mwr mwr GwvhI ]AGwie Gwie au`ThIN ]Anyk bwx bu`ThIN ]35]
transliteration: Beant Soor Dhaav-hee|| Su Maar Maar Ghaav-hee|| Aghaae Ghaae Outthh-heen|| Anek Baan Boutth-heen||35||
translation: Many warriors are running forward and with their blows are wounding the enemies. Many warriors, being wounded, are roaming and showering arrows.35.

gurmukhi: AnMq AsqR s`jkY ]cly su bIr g`jkY ]
transliteration: Anant Astra Sajjkai|| Chale Su Beer Gadjkai||
translation: Bedecked with several arms, the warriors are marching forward and thundering;

gurmukhi: inrBY hQXwr JwrhIN ]su mwr mwr aucwrhIN ]36]
transliteration: Nirbhai Hathyaar Jhaar-heen|| Su Maar Maar Ouchaar-heen||36||
translation: And striking their blows fearlessly, are shouting “kill, kill”.36.

gurmukhi: GmMf Gor ijau Gtw ]cly bnwie iqau Qtw ]
transliteration: Ghamannd Ghor Jio Ghataa|| Chale Banaae Tio Thataa||
translation: Preparing themselves like the thundering dark clouds, the brave fighters are marching forward.

gurmukhi: su ssqR sUr soBhIN ]suqw surwn loBhIN ]37]
transliteration: Su Sastra Soor Sobh-heen|| Soutaa Suraan Lobh-heen||37||
translation: Bedecked with weapons, they are looking so beautiful that the daughters of the gods are getting allured by them.37.

gurmukhi: su bIr bIn kY brYN ]surys log ibcrYN ]
transliteration: Su Beer Been Kai Darain|| Sures Log Bichrain||
translation: They are very selective in wedding the warriors and all the heroes are moving about and looking impressive in the battlefield like Indra, the king of gods.

gurmukhi: su qRws BUp jy bjy ]su dyv puqRkw qjy ]38]
transliteration: Su Traas Bhoop Je Baje|| Su Dev Poutrakaa Taje||38||
translation: All those kings, who are frightened, they have been abandoned by the daughters of the gods.38.

gurmukhi: su ssqR AsqR s`jky pry hkwr kY hTI ]iblok ru`dR ru`dR ko bnwie sYx eykTI ]
transliteration: Su Sastra Astra Sajjke Dare Hakaar Kai Hathee|| Bilok Ruddra Ruddra Ko Banaae Sain Ekathee||
translation: The warriors thundering dreadfully and bedecked with arms and weapons fell (on the enemy) and seeing the anger of Rudra, they gathered all the forces.
